instructions: Tap Following, then tap the search field. Enter any of the following: The name of a channel, such as CNN or Washington Post A topic, such as fashion, business, or politics A story, such as the rescue of a baby elephant

Open the Settings app on your phone or tablet. Tap Accounts and then Add account . Select Google as the type of account. Sign in with your full email address and password. If you use 2-Step Verification, verify the device. Follow the instructions on the screen to finish the sign in process.
Open the Settings app on your phone or tablet. Tap Accounts . Select an account. Tap Account sync. Turn off Google Calendar.
